titleStmt.title: A spectacle fo[r] pe[r]iu[r]e[r]s 27. Die Nouemb. 1589. / [by] W. Fulwood.
titleStmt.author: Fullwood, William, fl. 1562.
Jones, John.

notesStmt.note: Proofsheet, with corrections, which contains perjured testimony of John Jones of St. Sepulchre's Parish, London.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
